roleset.name: realistic, applied
roleset.note: PRACTICAL-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from practical.01-j)

example.name: practical-j: With it extraposition
example.text: So depending upon who the linguists you are bringing in are , it *EXP* may be possible / practical to get some real heavyweights to come in for their support ....
example.arg: to get some real heavyweights to come in for their support ....

example.name: practical-j: All args
example.text: I'd love to have a Camry, even to lease, but I picked the Toyota Corolla, because I figured it was more practical for me
